import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ReportService } from '../report.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-report-viewer', templateUrl: './report-viewer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./report-viewer.component.css'] }) export class ReportViewerComponent implements OnInit { applicationNo: string = '1'; reportData: any[] = []; isLoading = true; constructor(private reportService: ReportService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.fetchReportData(); } async fetchReportData() { this.isLoading = true; this.reportData = await this.reportService.getReport(this.applicationNo); this.isLoading = false; } }
